FuncDef:
The peer command sets an IP address and a DR priority for an adjacent device on an NBMA network.
The undo peer command cancels the configured IP address and DR priority. The peer command sets an IP address and a DR priority for an adjacent device on an NBMA network. The undo peer command cancels the configured IP address and DR priority. By default, IP address and a DR priority for an adjacent device on an NBMA network is not set.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address for an adjacent router.
Dotted decimal notation.

Sets a priority for an adjacent router for DR election.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 255. The default value is 1.
